body: What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Turn 25 - game.log (almost at the eof) https://www.dropbox.com/s/cq780ji53fel4ik/trenching-steed_game.log What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? magarena 1.48.909
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: AI issue: computer casts Trenching Steed and sacrifices ALL its lands - without any need.

comments.body:
btw: AI is minimax, as always.

another weird behaviour - Faerie Impostor. Computer casts it, then returns it to its own hand. Again and again.

game.log - most notable in turn 13 https://www.dropbox.com/s/v7cmkp66s9qelhw/faerie-impostor_game.log
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
